lines.text: [watching a video of two people having sex]
That is the weirdest thing I've ever seen.
That's why we gave it up 3,000 years ago.
[Celeste consults with the alien council]
The subject says he will be unable to think about science unless he marries me.
Well, marry him.
But we don't know what "marry" is.
One moment.
[the second council member takes a book. He and the council chief leaf through it until they find the page about marriage]
he goes off to fight the Turks, and you put on a lock.
[Celeste is confused]
No, no, no.
[they leaf more pages]
you cook and clean and bring him martinies.
No, no!
Wrong again? Ridiculous...
[they leaf more pages]
you will have to have more sex.

[excitedly]
I'll do it!
Earthmen will fall to their knees, betray their country and give away valuable real estate for a desirable woman.
[reporting to her father that her stepmother is more than she seems]
I saw her drink the battery juice from your Honda!
BABY!
Thinks he's cute, doesn't he?
Yes, but I was mother's favorite!
Oh, that was the most beautiful woman I've ever seen.

[off his girlfriend's look]
I mean, uh, ehh, second most beautiful... Third... A dog!

[after changing to new dress in Dr. Mills' car]
Is this acceptable?
Is the drool apparent?
Would you mind if I kissed you?
Does it hurt?
Not the way I do it.
I think... I think...
What?
Would I scare you... if I told you I love you?
Not unless you hit me at the same time.
I'm serious.
So am I!
[on Ron's braces]
Ooh, mouth jewelry!
If you want my secrets, you'll eat my sandwich!

[looking at her Dad and Celeste through a window]
I think they're gonna kiss!
Does he even know how?
I saw him do it once in 1983.
[after a long & strange make out, both somewhat out of breath]
I've never felt anything like that before.
Do I now have to eat the chocolate from Pennsylvania?

[laughs; looks slightly confused]
What?
[after Steve asks if she wants to have sex]
Sure. I just have to figure out what that is.
[as the Mills dog sniffs The Bag]
Back off, Alpo Breath!
